description: This file defines data classes for configuration objects related to WebSocket and MQTT in a Kotlin project. The classes include WsConfig, MqttConfig, and AppConfig, each holding configuration parameters with default values.

classes.name: WsConfig
classes.description: Configuration for WebSocket connection, including server URL and optional auth token.

classes.name: MqttConfig
classes.description: Configuration for MQTT broker connection, including broker URI, client ID, credentials, and default topics/QoS.

classes.name: AppConfig
classes.description: Aggregates WsConfig and MqttConfig into a single application configuration object.
